title: Business/ Data Analyst, Intern
description: Working closely with C-suite executives to implement data-driven solutions and cloud infrastructure, improving operational efficiency and project delivery.
achievements: Collaborated weekly with C-suite executives, resulting in a 25% improvement in project delivery timelines
Implemented cloud infrastructure onboarding using Ansible, CloudFormation, and AWS Lambda with 100% seamless deployment on EKS
Designed ML pipeline with Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform (AWS CI/CD via Jenkins) for optimal model deployment
Developed real-time data pipeline with BeautifulSoup, Selenium, and AWS ECS, improving data ingestion by 40%
Transformed 25+ Tableau dashboards, enhancing SQL-powered athlete performance tracking by 15%

title: Data Analyst, Intern
description: Designed and developed data analytics solutions and interactive dashboards to support business decision-making processes.
achievements: Conceptualized and designed interactive dashboards in R using Shiny and ggplot2 for sales teams
Refined data preprocessing tasks using Pandas and Dask, including outlier detection and missing value imputation
Improved data quality for downstream analysis through feature scaling and normalization techniques
